Articles.Content: Hello everyone, my name is Karolis, but you can call me CJ. When, I first started playing KSP, everything seemed so difficult and to be honest situation still didn't really changed, but I do a lot more things now, I started building bigger ships, rovers, planes etc. I'm getting more and more into the game. I still have some questions and the best way to get answers is join the community, that's why, I created account here! Thank you for your attention
hi CJ! It's great to have you here! As you already know, we love to help. I suggest the Tutorials or Game-play questions Subforums as a start. Hope you stay awhile!

Hello CJ, and welcome to the forums!

I hope you get all the answers you need, and more.

Happy landings!
Thank you guys! I really appreciate that you welcome me so friendly .
